description: ![eleven sports live streamjuventus]()### Google Home Black Friday Deals: What to expect and deals live now](https://www.trustedreviews.com/deals/google-home-black-friday-3333404"Google Home Black Friday Deals: What to expect and deals live now")  *   * [**Eleven Sports annual pass**](https://www.elevensports.uk/secure/subscription?sku=BALLANNUAL&signup=true)  * [**Eleven Sports monthly pass**](https://www.elevensports.uk/secure/subscription?sku=BALLMONTHLY&signup=true)## Eleven Sports free trialIf you prefer to try before you buy, new customers can sign up to a freeseven-day trial.To try it out for free, visit the website, choose the monthly pass, create anaccount and add your payment details.You won’t be charged during the first seven days of your subscription, and youcan cancel at any point by clicking the Account button at the top-right of thehome page, and hitting Subscription.**Read more:[Best VPN](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best/best-vpn-3470328)**## Eleven Sports live footballThis weekend (November 2-4), Eleven Sports is showing the following games live(all times GMT):**Friday, November 2**  * 7:20pm − Napoli vs Empoli (ES1)**Saturday, November 3**  * 11:55am − Leganes vs Atletico Madrid (ES1)  * 4:50pm − Fiorentina vs Roma (ES2)  * 5:25pm − Valencia vs Girona (ES1)  * 7:20pm − Juventus vs Cagliari (ES2)  * 7:40pm − Rayo Vallecano vs Barcelona (ES1)**Sunday, November 4**  * 10:55am − Eibar vs Alaves (ES1)  * 11:20am − Lazio vs SPAL (ES2)  * 1:50pm − Sampdoria vs Torino (ES2)  * 3:10pm − Villarreal vs Levante (ES1)  * 4:50pm − Bologna vs Atalanta (ES2)  * 5:25pm − Real Sociedad vs Sevilla (ES1)  * 7:20pm − Udinese vs AC Milan (ES2)  * 7:40pm − Real Betis vs Celta Vigo (ES1)## Eleven Sports Facebook free streamsOne La Liga match and one Serie A match will be live-streamed for free everyweek on the company’s [UK Facebookpage](https://www.facebook.com/ElevenSportsUK/), apart from during theinternational and winter breaks. These are always announced in advance onEleven Sports’ Facebook and Twitter pages.A selection of Eredivisie, Allsvenskan and Chinese Super League games willalso be streamed for free on Facebook throughout the season.**Read more:[When can you watch Match of the Day oniPlayer?](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/match-of-the-day-bbc-iplayer-3530308)**## Eleven Sports appEleven Sports is currently not available through Sky, Virgin TV, BT TV, asmart TV app, Amazon Fire TV or Roku.“We are working hard to ensure distribution everywhere and that means that weare also in discussions with all major platforms (including Sky, BT & Virgin)in the UK and Ireland to offer you the widest possible access to our content,”the company has said.“To request Eleven Sports on your platform, let their customer service knowvia social media or via the appropriate feedback channels. They are alwaysresponsive to customer demand and take note of requests.”So how can you tune in? Through the website or through the app, which isavailable on both iOS and Android. Here are some quick-links to help you:  * [**Eleven Sports website**](http://elevensports.com/)  * [**Eleven Sports iOS app**](https://itunes.apple.com/sg/app/eleven-sports/id1111205474?mt=8)  * [**Eleven Sports Android app**](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.elevensportsnetwork.elevenuk&hl=en_US)Unfortunately though, you can only use your account to tune in on a singledevice at a time.> Big news! You can now cast to your TV using Chromecast and your iOS orAndroid device. This weekend sees ELEVEN broadcast thirteen live games from[#SerieA](https://twitter.com/hashtag/SerieA?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw),[#LaLiga](https://twitter.com/hashtag/LaLiga?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw) andthe[#Eredivisie](https://twitter.com/hashtag/Eredivisie?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw).That's what we call[#PURESPORT](https://twitter.com/hashtag/PURESPORT?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw).[pic.twitter.com/fUeAIWHHQz](https://t.co/fUeAIWHHQz)>> — Eleven Sports (@ElevenSports_UK) [August 31,2018](https://twitter.com/ElevenSports_UK/status/1035583704545079297?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)## How to watch Eleven Sports on TVBig news − the Eleven Sports app, for both Android and iOS, is now Chromecast-compatible. You can also cast games from your computer to your TV throughGoogle Chrome.Don’t have a Google Chromecast? You can always connect your laptop to yourtelly the old-fashioned way, via HDMI.## Eleven Sports streamsEleven Sports sadly isn’t yet available in 4K − at present, live streams topout at 1080p. The company also recommends being on a connection with a minimumdownload speed of 6Mbps for the smoothest streaming experience.As well as live streams, the company will let you watch highlights on-demand.What’s more, any matches it shows live will be available on-demand – and intheir entirety, boring bits and all – for a full 24 hours.As games are being streamed and not televised, we’d recommend staying awayfrom Twitter and any live blogs, in order to avoid spoilers.“As with all online streaming, there will be a short delay on our liveoutput,” the company has confirmed. “The Eleven Sports platform will featureadaptive playback which dynamically adjusts the quality of the video streamyou receive based on the speed of your connection.”**Are you tempted by Eleven Sports? Let us know why on Twitter@TrustedReviews.**
